Question: Zosi Technologies Co., Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zosi Technologies Co., Limited

Zosi C308AH security cameras with base station

- 5MP Wi-Fi Security Camera System
- Cameras paired with a base station and an app
- Power over Ethernet (PoE) for camera
- IP66 weather rating
- MicroSD cards for local video recording
- HaLow™ Wi-Fi technology for extended range
- Pricing: $40 to $50 per camera
- Daytime images are crisp, with AI-enhanced security features
- Inbuilt alarm clocked at 85 dBA
- Night vision with black and white or color mode
- Customer service rated 2.9 out of 5 stars on Trustpilot
- Recommended for basic front or backyard surveillance, with battery-operated options available
Summary_cn:
Zosi技术有限公司

Zosi C308AH安全摄像头与基站

- 5MP Wi-Fi安全摄像头系统
- 摄像头与基站和手机应用程序配对
- 摄像头采用PoE供电
- IP66防护等级
- 用于本地视频录制的MicroSD卡
- 使用HaLow™ Wi-Fi技术扩展范围
- 价格：每个摄像头40到50美元
- 白天图像清晰，具有AI增强的安全功能
- 内置85分贝的警报钟
- 夜视功能，可选择黑白或彩色模式
- 在Trustpilot上的客户服务评分为2.9颗星
- 推荐用于基本前院或后院监控，并提供电池供电选项
